name: Sinitta
description: '''Sinitta Renet Malone''' (born 19 October 1963), known mononymously as '''Sinitta''', is an American-British singer. She initially found commercial success in the mid-1980s with the singles "[[So Macho]]", "[[Toy Boy (song)|Toy Boy]]","[[GTO (Sinitta song)|GTO]]", and "[[Cross My Broken Heart (Sinitta song)|Cross My Broken Heart]]"  and had several other hits during the decade. In the 2000s, she appeared on television in ''[[Loose Women]]'', ''[[The Xtra Factor (British TV series)|The Xtra Factor]]'' and ''[[This Morning (TV programme)|This Morning]]''. She took part in the [[ITV (TV network)|ITV]] show ''[[I'm a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!]]'' in 2011.
